introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we provide business analytics solutions that go beyond dashboards. We combine data analysis, predictive modeling, and process optimization to reveal bottlenecks, opportunities, and risks in your business.

Our analytics approach connects across finance, operations, sales, marketing, and customer experience — giving leadership a 360° view of performance. Whether you’re a startup or enterprise, we help you scale smarter, cut inefficiencies, and forecast with confidence.

case_study_section.headline: 25% Cost Reduction & 40% Faster Deliveries with Business Analytics

problem.label: Problem
problem.text: A logistics company struggled with rising costs and delivery delays but lacked visibility into performance metrics.

solution.label: Solution
solution.text: We built a business analytics framework integrating operations data, delivery KPIs, and customer feedback.

result.label: Result
result.text: The company reduced logistics costs by 25% and cut delivery delays by 40%, while improving customer satisfaction scores.

questions.question: Which tools can you automate?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: Will automation replace my team?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: How much time can automation save?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: Do you create AI agents?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
